name: marten
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small wild mammal found in Europe and North America and sometimes hunted for its fur: Martens have been found alongside hiking trails. One trapper caught 500 marten last season. She wore a coat trimmed with black marten fur. See also
pine marten
More examplesFewer examplesMartens have been known to chase and catch red squirrels trying to escape up tall trees.The marten tried to jump over the wire netting, but it was too high.Mink and marten varied in price according to quality.
